name: Combo Offer: Gaudí & Shopping
description: Enjoy Barcelona in total comfort! See the Gaudí houses on Passeig de Gràcia, visit the Sagrada Família temple and spend the afternoon in one of the collection of Chic Outlet Shopping® Villages across Europe: La Roca Village.Take advantage of this offer to visit the most admired works of Gaudí combined with the smartest shopping.
